entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 04:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: SSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain beginning late this morning. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 7. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
